name: macho-brace
effect:
Held
:   When the holder would gain effort due to battle, it gains double that effort instead.

Held in battle
:   Holder has half its Speed.
short_effect: Held: Holder gains double effort values from battles, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A hold item that
promotes growth,
but reduces SPEED.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A hold item that
promotes growth,
but reduces SPEED.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It promotes strong growth but
lowers SPEED while it is held.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a stiff and heavy brace that promotes
strong growth but lowers Speed.
